formulas.name: Unit Vector
formulas.description: Vector of magnitude 1 in direction of ā

formulas.name: Position Vector
formulas.formula: Vector of point P(x,y,z) = xi + yj + zk
formulas.description: Vector from origin to point P

formulas.name: Dot Product (Component Form)
formulas.description: Scalar result. Also called scalar product or inner product.

formulas.name: Dot Product (Angle Form)
formulas.description: Used to find angle between vectors

formulas.name: Perpendicular Vectors
formulas.description: Vectors are perpendicular when dot product = 0

formulas.name: Scalar Projection
formulas.description: Signed length of projection. Positive if same direction.

formulas.name: Vector Projection
formulas.formula: Projection vector of ā on b̄ = [(ā·b̄)/|b̄|²]b̄
formulas.description: Vector component of ā along b̄

formulas.name: Cross Product
formulas.formula: ā×b̄ = |i j k; a₁ a₂ a₃; b₁ b₂ b₃| (determinant form)
formulas.description: Vector perpendicular to both ā and b̄. |ā×b̄| = |ā||b̄|sinθ

formulas.name: Cross Product Properties
formulas.description: Anti-commutative. Cross product of parallel vectors = zero vector.

formulas.name: Parallel Vectors
formulas.description: Vectors are parallel when cross product is zero vector

formulas.name: Area of Triangle
formulas.description: Half the magnitude of cross product of two edge vectors

formulas.name: Area of Parallelogram
formulas.description: Magnitude of cross product of adjacent sides

formulas.name: Scalar Triple Product
formulas.formula: [ā b̄ c̄] = ā·(b̄×c̄) = determinant of 3×3 matrix
formulas.description: Result is a scalar. Represents signed volume of parallelepiped.

formulas.name: Volume of Parallelepiped
formulas.description: Absolute value of scalar triple product

formulas.name: Coplanarity Condition
formulas.description: Vectors are coplanar if scalar triple product = 0

formulas.name: Vector Triple Product (BAC-CAB)
formulas.description: BAC minus CAB rule. Result is a vector in the plane of b̄ and c̄.

formulas.name: Lagrange's Identity
formulas.description: Relates cross product to dot product and magnitudes
